_header: The right way to heaven Jesu Thou me show
_description: ‘A praier for may personis: Vias tuas…’ — two couplets

Lam541.Transcription:
The ryȝth wey to heuen iesu þou me scheweAnd þe priuy
                    pathes þou telle me to knowedresse me lorde almythi in credo
                    lyuyngÞat y may plese þe ihesu moste
                    benyge
Lam541.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Five Middle English Verse Prayers from Lambeth MS. 541.” 
             Neophilologus
         38 (1954): 36-41: 39.
